metadata.description: Senior-level professional advancing toward staff/principal roles

hero.title: Your roadmap to become a Staff/Principal {role} Engineer is ready!
hero.subtitle: Advance from Senior Engineer to Staff/Principal level

skillsToLearn.description: specialized and strategic skills for staff-level impact

phases.title: Strategic Thinking: Architecture & Design Excellence
phases.description: Master large-scale systems design and architectural decision-making

learningPoints.title: Large-Scale System Design
learningPoints.description: Design systems that scale to millions of users with high reliability

learningPoints.title: Architectural Decision Making
learningPoints.description: Understand trade-offs between different architectural approaches

learningPoints.title: Distributed Systems Patterns
learningPoints.description: Master patterns for building resilient distributed systems

learningPoints.title: Performance at Scale
learningPoints.description: Optimize systems for extreme scale and performance

target.description: Design or redesign a major system in your codebase

whyItMatters: Staff engineers drive architectural decisions that impact companies
Large-scale thinking is the primary differentiator at senior levels
Shows you can handle the complexity of critical systems
Demonstrates long-term thinking beyond current projects

phases.title: Leadership & Influence: Technical Direction & Mentorship
phases.description: Develop leadership skills and influence technical direction

learningPoints.title: Technical Vision & Strategy
learningPoints.description: Define and communicate technical direction for teams

learningPoints.title: Cross-Functional Leadership
learningPoints.description: Lead initiatives across multiple teams and departments

learningPoints.title: Mentorship & Coaching
learningPoints.description: Develop junior and mid-level engineers effectively

learningPoints.title: Executive Communication
learningPoints.description: Present technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders

target.description: Lead initiatives that impact multiple teams

whyItMatters: Staff engineers influence technology choices beyond their team
Leadership and mentorship multiply your impact
Shows you can communicate vision effectively
Demonstrates readiness for principal or director roles

phases.title: Expert Authority: Industry Impact & Thought Leadership
phases.description: Establish yourself as an expert and contribute to the industry

learningPoints.title: Technical Writing
learningPoints.description: Share knowledge through blogs, papers, and documentation

learningPoints.title: Conference Speaking
learningPoints.description: Present at industry conferences and events

learningPoints.title: Open Source Contribution
learningPoints.description: Contribute to or maintain significant open-source projects

target.description: Blog post, conference talk, or open source contribution

whyItMatters: Staff engineers are recognized experts in their domain
Industry contributions establish credibility and influence
Thought leadership opens opportunities for principal/director roles
Shows commitment to advancing the broader engineering community
